original_text: And if anyone will not receive you or listen to your words, shake off the dust from your feet when you leave that house or town.
korean_text: 누구든지 너희를 영접하지도 아니하고 너희 말을 듣지도 아니하거든 그 집이나 성에서 나가 너희 발의 먼지를 떨어 버리라

sentences.original_text: And if anyone will not receive you
shake off the dust from your feet
when you leave that house or town.
